description: This file defines two controller functions for user authentication: register and login. It serves as an HTTP interface layer that calls authService functions and handles responses.

methods.name: export async function register(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) { register
methods.description: Handles user registration by invoking authService.register and returning the result or error response.

methods.name: export async function login(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) { login
methods.description: Handles user login by invoking authService.login and returning the result or error response.
